subtitles: 15400 17600 First, there was darkness.
19100 21900 Then came the Strangers.

21900 24500 They were a race
as old as time itself.

25600 28200 They had mastered
the ultimate technology--

28200 33200 the ability to alter
physical reality by will alone.

33200 35700 They called this ability
''Tuning.''
36900 38700 But they were dying.

38700 41700 Their civilization was
in decline,

41700 44300 and so they abandoned
their world,

44300 46800 seeking a cure
for their own mortality.

48200 51600 Their endless journey brought
them to a small, blue world...

51600 53600 in the farthest corner
of the galaxy.
54600 56000 Our world.

57000 59000 Here, they thought
they had finally found...

59000 60800 what they had been
searching for.

71200 74000 My name is
Dr. Daniel Poe Schreber.
74900 76500 l am just a man.

76500 79700 l help the Strangers
conduct their experiments.
80700 82700 l have betrayed my own kind.
281700 283400 You are confused, aren't you?

283400 286200 Frightened. That's all right.
l can help you.

286200 287700 -Who is this?
-l'm a doctor.

287700 290400 You must listen to me.
You have lost your memory.

290400 292500 There was an experiment.
Something went wrong.

292500 294600 Your memory was erased.
Do you understand me?

294600 296600 No, l don't understand.
What's going on here?

296600 299300 There are people coming for you
as we speak.

299300 301500 Don't let them find you.
Leave now.
302600 304700 Hello? Are you there?

345200 347600 Hey, Mr. Murdoch,
the Automat called.
347600 349000 Said you left your wallet there.

350000 353500 l suggest you retrieve it, since
you only paid for three weeks,
353500 355200 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
357200 358700 l've been here three weeks?

358700 361700 lt's right there
in black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
361700 364100 Day and date.

364100 367300 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.

367300 370200 -l'll take care of it later.
-See that you do.

370200 372300 Only thing makes you a guest
in this joint...
372300 373600 is cash on the barrelhead!

390800 393400 House rules.
Three weeks is three weeks.
393400 395800 No days off for good behavior.

406300 409900 Mr. Murdoch, yes?
Where is he?

409900 413200 He just left
not five minutes ago.

418700 422600 When the rumba rhythm
start to play
422600 424700 Dance with me
424700 427700 Make me sway
427700 431500 Like a lazy ocean hugs the shore
431500 433700 Hold me close
433700 436400 Sway me more

436400 440400 Like a flower bending
in the breeze
440600 442900 Bend with me
442900 445700 Sway with ease

445700 449500 When we dance,
you have a way with me
449500 451900 Stay with me
451900 454400 Sway with me

455100 459100 Hey, sweetie, he said he was
your husband's doctor.
459100 460500 He wanted to speak with you.

483000 484600 -Doctor...
-Schreber.

484600 488600 Please, won't you come in?
You must be Emma Murdoch.

489700 493000 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
493000 494400 What is this?

494400 497900 A rather crude experiment
designed to further my studies.

497900 501500 l don't understand. You say
you're my husband's doctor,

501500 504000 but he never
mentioned you to me.

504000 506700 The truth is, John has been
coming to see me...
506700 508100 for quite some time.

508100 511400 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

511400 514400 stemming from
your marital difficulties.

514400 516200 -John told you what happened.
-Yes.

517500 519700 When was the last time
that you saw him?

519700 522500 Three weeks ago.
He packed a suitcase.
522500 525000 He was very angry at me.

525000 527700 l understand how difficult
this must be for you,
527700 529100 but for John's sake,

529100 531900 l would like you to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

531900 535500 lt appears that John
has suffered a psychotic break.

535500 538500 -Complete memory loss.
-You can't be serious.

538500 541400 Oh, but l am.
He may be delusional.
541400 542600 Even violent.

543900 547700 lf he were to contact you,
you must call me immediately.

547700 550500 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
551800 552900 For himself.

562700 566700 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
lt is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?
567300 570600 Mr. ''J'' something Murdoch?

573900 578300 J. Murdoch. What's your name?
Justin? Jerry?

582000 584100 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.

584100 586900 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
Hi. Jack Murdoch.
592600 594300 Got to get a grip on myself.

617400 620700 l told the guy,
cash on the barrelhead.

620700 623900 l said, ''Listen,
three weeks is three weeks.''

623900 627700 -Where's our lucky winner?
-Upstairs, sir. Room 614.
628500 629800 The call girl.

634300 637100 -Evening, Husselbeck.
-lnspector Bumstead.
637100 638700 Your lace is untied.
649200 650800 Am l glad you're here, sir.

650800 653300 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

653300 655800 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

685100 687500 -Thanks a lot.
-Excuse me.

689900 691500 -Hello?
-Oh, it's you.

692300 694900 -You left your wallet here.
-When did l do that?

694900 697000 -When you was last here.
-When was that?

697000 700700 When you left your wallet.
Expect me to remember?

705900 708500 -Excuse me!
-No, no, seriously.

725200 727000 -Where you headed, chief?
-Home.
727000 728300 And where's home?

728300 731000 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?
731000 733200 l'm just doing my job, May.
733200 735200 There's a killer out there.

735200 738100 Look for him
instead of cooling your heels.
740900 742600 Go on. Get out of here.

755300 758000 What's that make so far?
Six hookers in all?

758000 761200 -l believe so, sir.
-Give the man an ''A'' for effort.
766000 768200 So, Husselbeck,

768200 774500 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?

774500 776300 -Got me, sir.
-Bumstead.

776300 779500 What took you? This killer's
been running circles around us,
779500 780600 thanks to Walenski.

780600 782400 With all due respect,
Chief lnspector,

782400 785300 l've known Eddie a long time,
and he's a good cop.

785300 787500 Whatever kind of cop
Walenski once was...
787500 789400 he let drift a long time ago.
789400 791100 Let me talk to Bumstead!
791100 793100 Come on! Hold on!

797800 799800 -Get his arm !
-They're watching us!

799800 802000 -On your feet!
-There's no way out!
803400 805000 God, can't you see?

808300 810500 Let me go!
l'm not going to hurt you.

812000 814100 -What was that?
-Walenski.

822200 825200 l'm being punished
for my sins, right?

825200 829200 What did l ever do to inherit
this? Where do you begin?

829400 832200 Well, everything Detective
Walenski committed to paper...
832200 833600 should be here, so--

833600 836500 The only thing that should be
committed is Walenski.

838400 840200 Nothing like
a little healthy paranoia.

846400 849700 l came here to file a missing
persons report for my husband.

849700 853400 -Take it to the front desk.
-They told me to come see you.
855100 856700 His name's John Murdoch.

859700 862900 Do these names mean
anything to you?
863700 865600 Who are these women?

865600 867400 Why are you looking
for my husband?

867400 869600 Are you going to accuse him
of something?

869600 873000 -Maybe. Maybe murder.
-Whose murder?

874400 877500 -Which one?
-All of them.

878900 882100 Mrs. Murdoch, l am sorry.
l didn't mean to alarm you.

882100 884700 l'm sorry that l came.
l just made a mistake.

884700 888700 lf you'd please just give me
half a second to explain.
897400 898500 We met before?

900200 903100 lf we did,
l hope you're still breathing.
903100 904600 What's your name, honey?

908300 910000 Well, that's
an appropriate name.
917600 918800 l was just thinking.

925500 930400 lt seems kind of dangerous...
right now.

930400 932300 How do you know
l'm not the killer?

932300 935800 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

936300 938800 You feeling any urges
l should know about?

996900 1000600 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1000600 1004600 -Who are you?
-We might ask the same question.

1084000 1087100 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.

1087100 1090100 -lt is said he is able to Tune.
-lmpossible!

1090100 1093100 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1093100 1095900 On occasion, the imprinting
does not take.

1095900 1098300 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1098300 1101900 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1101900 1104000 But this one was different, yes?

1104000 1107600 -What has the doctor to say?
-He has failed to report in.

1107600 1110600 -And Mr. Quick?
-No more Mr. Quick.
1110600 1113100 Mr. Quick...dead, yes.
1116400 1119000 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1119000 1121800 Mr. Book...does he know?
1122700 1124700 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1125700 1128500 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1128500 1131400 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1131400 1133500 We must have this man.
1139200 1140300 My brand, l hope.
1152200 1153700 l've been worried about you.
1157500 1158800 Are you punishing me?

1159500 1162100 lf disappearing is
your way of punishing me,
1162100 1163300 l don't appreciate it.
1163300 1164400 What are you talking about?

1167800 1171800 l found these keys in my pocket,
so l assume l live here.

1173500 1176100 -You supposed to be my wife?
-''Supposed to be''?

1179100 1183400 You really...don't know
who l am, do you.

1183800 1186500 Your doctor called me. He was
worried that this might happen.

1190600 1194500 He gave me his card.
He's desperate to find you.

1201600 1203500 Feel like l'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1203500 1206800 What happened to me?
Why was l seeing a doctor?
1206800 1208200 l had an affair.
1210000 1211400 You were angry at me.

1214400 1217900 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.
1227200 1229500 Most unfortunate it is...

1229500 1232100 that we were forced
to seek you out here.

1232600 1237000 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this moisture.

1237500 1240700 -l'm sorry. l--
-Failed to report in, yes?

1240700 1243500 l was frightened.
l have a weak heart, you know.

1243500 1246900 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.
1246900 1249500 We found this in his hotel room.

1249500 1253000 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1253000 1255000 l tried to reprint him,
but he woke up.

1255000 1257200 He knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.

1257200 1260300 -He has no memories, then?
-Only fragments.

1260300 1261800 The procedure,
it was interrupted.

1261800 1264700 l guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1265100 1266800 You have had strays
before, right?

1266800 1270500 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can Tune.

1270500 1273500 But that's impossible.
Only you have that ability.

1273500 1275700 You will process
another template...
1275700 1277800 of the subject's memories, yes?

1277800 1279200 Of course.
l'll imprint him again.

1280800 1283900 We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1283900 1286700 lt's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1286700 1288400 We'll talk again
after tonight's Tuning,
1288400 1291300 but no more delays, yes?

1291300 1296300 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1297700 1299300 The police were looking for you.
1299300 1301400 l know. l saw the papers.

1301400 1303800 ''Killer stalks
city street-walkers.''
1307300 1309500 l was with one of those women.

1311000 1314300 -Before l came here tonight.
-l don't understand.

1314300 1319400 l met her outside an Automat.
l guess l wanted to test myself.

1320700 1324000 l wanted to know if l had it
in me to do those things.
1324000 1325400 Maybe l have lost my mind,

1325400 1328700 but whoever l am, l'm still me,
and l'm not a killer.
1334100 1335300 l believe you.

1342700 1344600 -What?
-The car outside.
1344600 1346100 The one you arrived in.

1346100 1348300 lt's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1350300 1352000 l didn't know he was still here.
1355500 1356900 Hold it right there, mister!

1359200 1362100 -Wait. You have the wrong man.
-Stand aside, will you, please?
1362100 1363600 l didn't kill anyone.

1363600 1365800 Right now,
all you are is a suspect.

1365800 1368900 Turn yourself in. l'll listen
to whatever you have to say.

1368900 1370900 You won't believe
what l have to say.

1372000 1375200 -Try me.
-There's someone after me.

1375200 1378700 lt's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1378700 1381500 And l don't even know if...
they're not even--

1381500 1383700 Yeah, who's going to listen
to a madman?

1383700 1386000 -Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
-Run!
1390200 1392100 No one ever listens to me.
1398100 1399100 Murdoch, stop!

1440300 1442900 -How much further?
-We're almost there, buddy.

1445900 1448200 You happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1448200 1451200 You're kidding! Me and the wife
spent our honeymoon there.

1451200 1454000 All you do is
take Main Street West to...

1456500 1459600 Or is it the Cross...
Now, that's funny.

1459600 1462600 l can't seem to remember
if it's Main Street West...
1462600 1463900 or the Crosstown.

1468400 1471300 l'm sorry, lnspector,
l cannot be of more assistance,

1471300 1473300 but l am running late
for an appointment.

1473300 1475300 Well, l appreciate you
taking the time.

1483700 1486000 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1486000 1490400 l've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.

1490400 1493100 Murdoch doesn't
strike me as one.

1493100 1496200 Perhaps you are not accustomed
to digging deep enough.

1496200 1499000 Well, l do know when
someone is lying to me, Doctor.

1499000 1503000 lnspector, judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1503000 1505000 Maybe you can give me
a few pointers.

1505000 1508800 Certainly.
Let's take you, for instance.

1508800 1511800 You are a fastidious man.
Driven.
1511800 1514100 Consumed by details.

1514100 1517500 l would say
your life is rather lonely.

1517500 1520300 Good evening, lnspector.
l really must be going.

1562000 1563700 -How is he?
-The same.
1564900 1567500 Walenski? lt's me, Frank.
1573600 1574700 Come in, Frank.
1577900 1579000 Close the door.

1586800 1590000 l've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1590000 1592000 lt's an interesting case.
1593000 1596100 Kind that make a man's career.

1597700 1601300 -Or break it.
-Yeah. l was on that case.

1601300 1605000 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1605000 1606400 Nothing happened, Frank.

1607300 1609300 l've just been spending time
in the subway,
1609300 1611200 riding in circles.

1611200 1615000 Thinking in circles.
There's no way out.
1616800 1618400 l've been over this entire city.

1622700 1624500 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1624500 1625900 She's not my wife.

1627700 1630600 l don't know who she is
or who any of us are.

1630600 1634200 -What makes you say that?
-You think about the past much?
1635800 1637200 As much as the next guy.

1638200 1640900 See, l've been trying
to remember things--

1640900 1643900 clearly remember things
from my past.

1643900 1646000 But the more
l try to think back,

1646000 1648900 the more it all starts
to unravel.
1648900 1650100 None of it seems real.

1650100 1654100 lt's like l've just
been dreaming this life,

1654100 1657000 and when l finally wake up,
l'll be somebody else,
1657000 1658900 somebody totally different.

1663100 1665100 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie.
1666300 1668700 Something to do with the case.

1669200 1672500 There is no case!
There never was!

1672500 1676300 lt's all just a big joke!
lt's a joke!
1715700 1717400 Tonight's requirements are...
1717400 1720500 12 family photo albums,
1720500 1722900 nine personal diaries,
1725000 1727300 assorted childhood photographs,

1727300 1731300 requisite false l.D.s
and social security cards.
1731400 1733500 These do bring back memories.
1735800 1738000 This one is still warm.

1739900 1743000 The recollections of
a great lover?
1743000 1745200 A catalogue of conquests?
1745900 1747300 We will soon find out.

1748600 1750000 You wouldn't
appreciate that,

1750000 1753200 would you,
Mr. Whatever-your-name is?

1753200 1757700 Not the sort of conquest
you would ever understand.

1760500 1763100 A touch of
unhappy childhood...

1768600 1771000 A dash of
teenage rebellion...
1772600 1775600 And last but not least...

1775600 1778000 a tragic death
in the family.

1789100 1792600 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the Tuning?

1792600 1796600 Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.
1796700 1797900 A freak of nature.

1797900 1800700 He's adapting to survive.
What do you expect?

1800700 1802500 Weren't you looking for
the human soul?

1802500 1805100 lsn't that the purpose
of your little zoo?

1805100 1808300 That's why you change people
and things every night.

1808300 1811100 Maybe you have finally
found what you are looking for,

1811100 1812600 and it's going to bite you
on your--

1816500 1818400 lt requires several
of your lifetimes...
1818400 1820000 to master our gifts.

1820000 1821800 The idea that
a simple man...

1821800 1823700 could develop the ability
to Tune is--
1823700 1824900 Absurd, l know.
1824900 1827100 What other explanation is there?
1877000 1878400 Shut it down.

1896200 1899200 Fredrickson says he'll take me
off the night shift.
1899200 1901000 lt's about time, dear.
1973900 1976000 Can anyone hear me?
1979000 1981700 Let the Tuning commence.
2135100 2136400 The Goodwins.
2136400 2138400 Charlie, Sylvia,
2138400 2140300 Jane, and little Matthew.
2144100 2146200 Jane and little Matthew.
2175100 2177300 The rich get richer.

2177300 2179400 Probably have
maid's quarters...

2179400 2180700 before the night
is through.
2232100 2234000 Dr. Schreber, l presume.

2236500 2238500 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor,
2238500 2240700 if that's what you are.
2242100 2243900 Why is everyone asleep?
2243900 2246200 Please keep your voice down.

2246200 2248100 l can't remember anything.
What have you done?
2248100 2250800 Nothing. l want to help you.

2250800 2254100 We cannot talk here.
lf they see us together--

2254100 2256900 l don't care.
l want some answers. Now!

2256900 2260000 Who are they?
Why are they trying to kill me?

2267000 2269900 -You really can do it.
-l did that?

2269900 2272500 Listen to me.
You have their power.

2272500 2274400 You can make things happen
by will alone.
2274400 2276000 They call it ''Tuning.''

2276000 2277900 That is how they change
the buildings.

2277900 2280300 Just now you acted
out of self-defense,

2280300 2283000 but l can teach you
to control your power.

2283000 2287000 We can stop them.
We can take the city back.

2343500 2345800 He made a terrible impression
for the firm,

2345800 2348500 lollygagging around
as he did.

2348500 2351300 So l told Fredrickson
l was letting him go.
2351300 2353200 Well you should have, darling.

2353900 2357400 He attacked me.
l don't know where he's gone.

2357400 2361200 Come, Dr. Schreber.
We have much to do.

2366000 2372200 They say that
you're a runaround lover
2373200 2380900 Though you say it isn't so

2383700 2390300 But if you put me down
for another
2391800 2397400 l'll know, believe me, l'll know

2398800 2402300 Tonight's experiment will
take place in these locations.

2402300 2406200 The first subject
shall be imprinted on Avenue M.
2406200 2409100 Mr. Book, there is a problem.
2409100 2410700 There is no Avenue M.

2410700 2412500 We were unable
to complete it.

2412500 2415900 During the last Tuning,
we detected a lack of control.

2415900 2419000 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2419000 2423000 This man Murdoch is
more powerful than we thought.
2423100 2425000 He is becoming like us.
2425000 2428300 So we must become like him.
2429200 2431500 The doctor has done as we asked?

2431500 2435400 The life and times
of John Murdoch, volume two.
2436900 2439500 We must not do this.

2439500 2442700 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2442700 2445500 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2445500 2448800 Everywhere he goes,
everyone he seeks out...
2448800 2450000 will be known to us.

2450000 2455000 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.
2455000 2457400 But to imprint one of us?
2457400 2460000 Failure has always resulted.

2460000 2463500 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2470200 2472100 This may sting a bit.
2511100 2514800 l have John Murdoch in mind.

2517000 2520900 ''Found this postcard
among your mother's things.

2520900 2523000 ''Brings back memories,
doesn't it?
2523000 2524900 ''Stop by sometime.

2524900 2528000 ''We'll see if we can't
hook ourselves another mermaid.
2528000 2530300 ''Love to Emma. Karl.''
2538300 2539800 Karl Harris.

2556600 2559600 Excuse me.
Which way is Avenue C?
2559600 2560800 Try the subway.
2564400 2565900 You got a problem, pal?
2565900 2568600 Been working here long?

2568600 2572200 25 years.
No days off for good behavior.
2595900 2598800 We're looking for John Murdoch.

2631600 2633600 She knows nothing,
Mr. Hand.
2633600 2635400 A dead end, Mr. Wall.

2635400 2638100 We thought his imprint
would let us track him.

2638100 2640600 But instead
we have been brought here.

2640600 2644500 -This is irrational.
-lnstincts are irrational.

2644500 2647700 We must follow
where they lead, yes?

2647700 2650800 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar.
2652100 2654100 He does not care about our job.
2654100 2656900 lndulge us, Mr. Hand.
2656900 2659500 lf you were Murdoch, yes?
2659500 2662700 lf l were Murdoch...

2664400 2667800 l would remember how
my wife had hurt me...
2667800 2669700 by sleeping with another man.

2674500 2678200 l would look for a way
to hurt her in return.

2680700 2685400 Leave me alone with her.
There's work to be done.

2688600 2690600 All change,
platform three.

2694300 2696500 Excuse me, how do l get
to the end of the line?
2696500 2697900 You want the Express.
2710000 2712400 How come the train didn't stop?
2712400 2713600 That's the Express.
2715200 2717000 There's no way out.

2717000 2720100 You can't get out of the city.
l've tried.
2720800 2722800 You're Murdoch, aren't you?

2722800 2724500 The one
they've been looking for.
2724500 2725600 You're not a killer.

2725600 2728200 They set you up with
a fake identity,
2728200 2729800 like everyone else here.

2729800 2731700 -Who are you?
-l was a cop.
2731700 2734700 At least in this life l was.
2734700 2737500 They steal peoples' memories.

2737500 2739300 Then they swap them around
between us.

2739300 2741900 l seen them do it,
back and forth...

2741900 2744000 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
2744000 2745300 How do you know all this?

2745300 2747000 Once in a while one of us
wakes up...
2747000 2748400 while they're changing things.

2749300 2751700 lt's not supposed to happen,
but it does.
2751700 2752900 lt happened to me.
2753600 2755500 They'll come looking for you.

2756600 2758800 Just like they'll come
looking for me.
2760200 2761400 l figured a way out.
2772300 2773500 They were here.
2776900 2779100 This was to be his home.
2781600 2783400 That was when we loved her.
2783400 2785700 This is all well and good,

2785700 2787600 but we require
a more practical link...
2787600 2789600 to his present whereabouts.
2794000 2796000 And l know where to find her.

2804100 2807300 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

2808300 2810300 To be able to revisit
those places...

2810300 2812200 which meant
so very much to us.

2813000 2815500 l thought we were haunted
by them.

2817200 2819600 There used to be a ferry
when l was a boy.
2819600 2821600 Biggest thing you ever saw.

4126000 4127900 Why are they doing all this?

4204200 4205600 because they needed them.
